actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The devil bough makes one claw attack and one bite attack.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 14 (3d6 + 4) slashing damage.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 17 (3d8 + 4) piercing damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it is grappled (escape DC 15). Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained and the devil bough can't make bite attacks against other targets.

special_abilities.name: Grinding Maw
special_abilities.desc: The devil bough has advantage on attack rolls against any creature grappled by its bite attack.

special_abilities.name: Like Calls to Like
special_abilities.desc: The devil bough knows if a creature within 60 feet of it is evil-aligned or not.
